::Prowl::

There's a strange tugging on the back of Prowl's mind as he listens 
to Firedrill's words. He knew he should be remembering something, but 
there was nothing recorded in his datatracks with any relevance to 
this. He tries to remember harder, and then Iron Raptor's thoughts 
distract him.

-Hmm.. Well, that battle wasn't as bad as some others. We had more 
factions helping us than firing at us.-



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Firedrill looked a little nervous but did not lack confidence. "I 
trained
> at the Cybertronian protection academy Mam, and I graduated with 
full
> honors." he finished, not loosening his stance.
